channel.title: Death Cape Glitch
channel.description: I added the death cape to my server and it looked fine, however when i run it sort of just levitates above my shoulders, i look at the skilcapes trying to find out if there is a way to control this, with no luck if i anyone could help me out with a fix it would be greatly appreciated
